entry.title: Hacking Forager — Part 1: DLL Injection (A Fun, Technical Deep Dive)

link.title: Hacking Forager — Part 1: DLL Injection (A Fun, Technical Deep Dive)

entry.summary:
Hey everyone! Welcome to the first entry of my multi-part series on hacking Forager — a wonderfully addictive 2D open-world crafting game by HopFrog. (And if you haven’t already played it, you can find it on steam. → Forager on Steam)
Forager throws you into a fast-paced loop of gathering, crafting, building and fighting. It’s simple on the surface but has a surprising amount of depth when y...
